1. percentage:
1
2. part per million [ppm]:
10000
3. part per billion [ppb]:
10000000
4. part per trillion [ppt]:
1e+10
5. part per quadrillion:
1e+13
6. gram/kilogram [g/kg]:
10
7. microgram/gram [ug/g]:
10000
8. nanogram/microgram [ng/ug]:
10
9. nanogram/gram [ng/g]:
10000000

1e+10

10000

10

10000000

10000

10

10000

10

10

10000
